H0.text: The former cricket umpire Harold (Dicky) Bird played cricket for Yorkshire and which other county. Lancashire

H1.text: The former cricket umpire Harold (Dicky) Bird played cricket for Yorkshire and which other county. Surrey

H2.text: The former cricket umpire Harold (Dicky) Bird played cricket for Yorkshire and which other county. Nottinghamshire

H3.text: The former cricket umpire Harold (Dicky) Bird played cricket for Yorkshire and which other county. Leics

A4.text: Bird played first-class cricket for Yorkshire and Leicestershire as a right-handed batsman

A5.text: Shortly before the start of the 1960 season he moved to Leicestershire
